Job Title: Business Analyst Intern

Location: Dallas, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Analyst, Information Technology, Research

Description:
Blue Yonder’s internship program looks to attract, develop and invest in the future workforce of Blue Yonder: Generation Z. Our interns are given the opportunity to work on projects that deliver real business value, network with associates worldwide, learn about our cutting-edge supply chain technology and develop world-class business knowledge. With an internship at Blue Yonder, a growth-mindset oriented company, the great possibilities for you to develop your career are endless.

Location: Remote

Start Date: May 2024 (full time during the summer)

Hourly Pay Rate: $21.00 (Undergraduate Student) $26.50 (Graduate Student)

About Blue Yonder

Blue Yonder is a leading supply chain software company, driving end-to-end, autonomous, and sustainable supply chains. Our cutting-edge technology empowers organizations to make smarter decisions, optimize operations, and enhance customer experiences. Join us on a journey to revolutionize the world of supply chain management.

Position Overview

We are seeking a highly motivated and detail-oriented intern to join our Platform team. This internship offers an excellent opportunity to gain experience related to understanding, analyzing, and improving business processes and operations. Join us in our mission to reshape supply chain management with cutting-edge technology and innovative solutions. Your skills and passion can make a significant impact!

Primary Duties And Responsibilities

Focuses on learning the craft and how to work in a team productively, in particular:

Supports senior team members in designing, developing and testing software applications.Research and contribute to quick proof of conceptsContinuously improves themselves and the code they produce.Learns how to improve readability and maintainability of code.Guided by team members, contributes simple features and bug fixes and provides matching test cases.Understands basic functional and technical requirements of software components.Participates in team activities such as backlog grooming, planning, daily standups, and retrospectives.Secondary Duties and ResponsibilitiesActively seeks support by team members to overcome obstacles.Understands company and team visions.Demonstrates problem solving and innovation ability.Finds suitable work items in the team backlog with the help of other team members.Develops an understanding of the problem domain the team works on.

Additional Qualifications For Consideration

Currently pursuing a bachelor’s degree or master’s degreeStrong interest in research and analyticsExcellent communication and teamwork skills.Ability to learn quickly and adapt to new technologies.

Our Values

If you want to know the heart of a company, take a look at their values. Ours unite us. They are what drive our success – and the success of our customers. Does your heart beat like ours? Find out here: Core Values

Diversity, Inclusion, Value & Equality (DIVE) is our strategy for fostering an inclusive environment we can be proud of. Check out Blue Yonder's inaugural Diversity Report which outlines our commitment to change, and our video celebrating the differences in all of us in the words of some of our associates from around the world.

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability or protected veteran status.

Watch the Summer Internship Program Video!

Experience Level (if available): None
